Posts.Content: Did you have your biopsy? Microcalcifications are dispersed and not as easy to id as say "a lump." A larger biopsy has to be done to "sample" the area. Hope if went fine for you. I had the same sort of procedure.
Posts.Title: Needle Localization/biopsy 1 2 3

Posts.Content: Seems like you're getting a lot of good feedback. What type of specialist is your GP sending you to?
Posts.Title: Anyone out there have nipple discharge????

Posts.Content: Did you have a screening mammogram and was it bumped up to a diagnostic?
Posts.Title: Anyone out there have nipple discharge????

Posts.Content: You've probably found out a lot of info since your posting. I just signed on to this service and saw your question. Were you positive for BRCA 1 or 2? There is a strong association with either breast or ovarian, depending on which one you're positive for.
Posts.Title: Prophalatic Double Mastectomy
